titleStmt.title: J. P. Warren to George W. Johnson
CWG14398

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

body.p:
June 15th 1861
Gw.W. Johnson Esqr
Dear Dir

Mr Peak informs me that you are willing to take the Cemetery lot sold to A. J. Viley in -- consequence of a misunderstanding about the payment of that lot & Mr Peaks. we are willing that you shall do so. the lot has been paid for & by Your getting an order for the lot from the Administration & paying them for it you can have a new deed issued to yourself.
